reviewText: SusieQ's Arms of a First Lady is an easy to follow and excellent workout.  How many of us women hate the flab we have on our arms but working out our arms is too difficult, we don't know where to start and we don't know what exercises to do.  This DVD is easy to follow and she has real women working out along side her so it doesn't intimidate you or make you feel like you can't do it!! Also, the energy Susy brings to the floor while working out keeps you motiviated and makes you laugh along with her! She is an amazing lady!  Just give it a try and you won't regret it I promise!
